text:
You could do something like
```examine(x, y, ypred) = (y != ypred) && @show(x, y, ypred)

for (x, y) in data
  ypred = model(x)
  examine.(eachcol(x), y, ypred)
end```
Here I assumed that `x` is a matrix of Feature x Batch, `y`/`ypred` are vectors. You can tweak according to your problem. Point is that you can still use batches of size 100 in the data loader and the model, then iterating the output of a batch is still fast for just examining.
